tensortrade.stochastic.utils.parameters moduleÂ¶

class tensortrade.stochastic.utils.parameters.ModelParameters(all_s0: float, all_time: int, all_delta: float, all_sigma: float, gbm_mu: float, jumps_lambda: float = 0.0, jumps_sigma: float = 0.0, jumps_mu: float = 0.0, cir_a: float = 0.0, cir_mu: float = 0.0, all_r0: float = 0.0, cir_rho: float = 0.0, ou_a: float = 0.0, ou_mu: float = 0.0, heston_a: float = 0.0, heston_mu: float = 0.0, heston_vol0: float = 0.0)[source]Â¶

Bases: object

Defines the model parameters of different stock price models.

Parameters

  • all_s0 (float) â€“ The initial asset value.

  • all_time (int) â€“ The amount of time to simulate for.

  • all_delta (float) â€“ The rate of time. (e.g. 1/252 = daily, 1/12 = monthly)

  • all_sigma (float) â€“ The volatility of the stochastic processes.

  • gbm_mu (float) â€“ The annual drift factor for geometric brownian motion.

  • jumps_lambda (float, default 0.0) â€“ The probability of a jump happening at each point in time.

  • jumps_sigma (float, default 0.0) â€“ The volatility of the jump size.

  • jumps_mu (float, default 0.0) â€“ The average jump size.

  • cir_a (float, default 0.0) â€“ The rate of mean reversion for Cox Ingersoll Ross.

  • cir_mu (float, default 0.0) â€“ The long run average interest rate for Cox Ingersoll Ross.

  • all_r0 (float, default 0.0) â€“ The starting interest rate value.

  • cir_rho (float, default 0.0) â€“ The correlation between the wiener processes of the Heston model.

  • ou_a (float, default 0.0) â€“ The rate of mean reversion for Ornstein Uhlenbeck.

  • ou_mu (float, default 0.0) â€“ The long run average interest rate for Ornstein Uhlenbeck.

  • heston_a (float, default 0.0) â€“ The rate of mean reversion for volatility in the Heston model.

  • heston_mu (float, default 0.0) â€“ The long run average volatility for the Heston model.

  • heston_vol0 (float, default 0.0) â€“ The starting volatility value for the Heston model.

tensortrade.stochastic.utils.parameters.default(base_price: float, t_gen: int, delta: float) → tensortrade.stochastic.utils.parameters.ModelParameters[source]Â¶

Creates a basic model parameter set with key parameters specified default parameters.

Parameters

  • base_price (float) â€“ The base price to use for price generation.

  • t_gen (int) â€“ The number of bars to generate.

  • delta (float) â€“ The time delta to use.

Returns

ModelParameters â€“ The default model parameters to use.

Creates a random model parameter set with key parameters specified default parameters.

Parameters

  • base_price (float) â€“ The base price to use for price generation.

  • t_gen (int) â€“ The number of bars to generate.

  • delta (int) â€“ The time delta to use.

Returns

ModelParameters â€“ The random model parameters to use.
